description: '''Excuse 17''' was a [[punk rock]] band from [[Olympia, Washington]], US, that performed and recorded from 1993 to 1995. The band consisted of [[Becca Albee]] (vocals and [[guitar]]), [[Carrie Brownstein]] (guitar and vocals), and Curtis James ([[Drum kit|drums]]). The band recorded two full-length albums and a single, and contributed to several compilation albums.
